name: RollTheDice
0:
”Alexa, open roll the dice”
”Alexa, ask roll the dice who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roll the dice
des: Use this skill to decide any number 2-12. It is supposed to replicate rolling 2 dice with a 100% realistic result. Alexa will grab two waxed, cleaned dice and roll them on her table and tell you what you get! You can use this to decide things too! Give each person a number and let Alexa roll her dice. Whoever is closest or on the spot with her number wins! It's just a simple dice roll!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
